item.title: Switch statement
item.dc:creator: @_ExiledScape `ExiledScape
item.description:
@_ExiledScape wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:4, topic:278831”]Just checking

But you’re missing your GoodDistance statement.

if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, destinationRange)) { viewTo(objectX, objectY); objectClick(objectID, objectX, objectY, 0, 0, 1); } else { ActionType = 1; destinationX = objectX; destinationY = objectY; destinationID = objectID; WalkingTo = true; }[/quote]

[code]case 132:
if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectID, objectX, objectY, destinationRange)) {

int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

int face2 = 0;

return;
if (!validClient || randomed)
break;
if (!antiHax())
break;
if (debug || (playerRights > 1)) {
println("serverobjs size " + server.objects.size());
println_debug("atObject: " + objectX + “,” + objectY
+ " objectID: " + objectID); // 147 might be id for
// object state changing
}

item.title: Switch statement

item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Just checking

But you’re missing your GoodDistance statement.

if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, destinationRange)) { viewTo(objectX, objectY); objectClick(objectID, objectX, objectY, 0, 0, 1); } else { ActionType = 1; destinationX = objectX; destinationY = objectY; destinationID = objectID; WalkingTo = true; }

item.title: Switch statement
item.dc:creator: @_ExiledScape `ExiledScape
item.description:
@_ExiledScape wrote:

What’s wrong with it?

The objects don’t work when I click them…

[code]public void objectClick1(int objectID, int objectX, int objectY) {
switch (objectID) {

case 1987:
if(absX == 2509 && absY == 3493 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){
sM(“You board the raft.”);
showInterface(8677);
actionInterval = 2500;
toX = 2512; //raft bit
toY = 3466;
}
break;

case 2020:
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
if(absX == 2512 && absY == 3466 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){
toX = 2511; //tree climb part
toY = 3463;
actionInterval = 2500;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
break;

case 2022:
if(absX == 2511 && absY == 3463 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){
toX = 2717; //Cave enter part
toY = 9808;
actionInterval = 2500;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
break;

}
}[/code]

Packet 132;

objectClick1(objectID, objectX, objectY);

Read full topic
